channel.description: Consoling in to MX80 from linux How to console into an MX80 router from linux DNS DNS Stuff How to Study for the CCNA Exam Guide to how you should approach studying for the CCNA exam Juniper CLI Basics Juniper Basics My CCNA Notes Notes I took for a multitude of CCNA resources Networking Network Devices and Network Connections Hostname, IP addressing, network protocols, network manager, tools, etc. Resources for Passing CCNA Resources for passing the CCNA exam Time Synchronization NTP, Chrony, etc. Toggle PoE on a Juniper Switch How to toggle PoE on a Juniper switch. What to Learn After CCNA What you should learn after taking the CCNA exam
